ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Public Health Institution Health Center of Skopje

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Public Health Institution Health Center of Skopje

CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.CONTACT_POINT: Public Health Institution Health Center of Skopje

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Procurement of personal protection equipment used by employees during work

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Procurement of personal protection equipment used by employees during work for the needs of PHI Healthcare Center of Skopje — Skopje

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Protective helmet — It should provide head protection from penetration, it should be shock absorbing with the tightening belts that absorb the kick caused by falling object and rejecting or sliding thanks to the ergonomic shape that throws aside the falling object. The helmet must not burn after fire exposure of 5 seconds. Made according to standard EN397 or equivalent. Helmet shall have under chin strip that will enable security after the helmet fall
Welding mask and helmet. Made according to standard EN397 or equivalent, with enabled specific security requirements of equipment for eyes and face protection during welding

Mask with gas and steam filters in accordance to EN 14387. Gas and steam filters Type A intended for organic gases and steam protection whose boiling point is higher than 65º C (solvents and carbohydrates). Filter class: Class 3 — High capacity filter (polluter concentration lower than 1 % or 10 000 ppm)

Gloves providing protection against chemical substances and microorganisms made from latex with layer of neoprene. Made in accordance to EN 374-1 or equivalent. Glove size 7 or 8 according to EN 420 standard or equivalent

Protection gloves that protect against physical and mechanical hazards, such as friction, cutting, penetration and tearing. Made according to standard EN388 4542 or equivalent. Resistance level 4. Glove size 7 or 8 according to EN 420 standard or equivalent

Protection gloves for welders. Made according to standard EN12477 or equivalent. Group of gloves: Group A- other welding procedures. Glove size 7-9 according to standard EN 420 EN407 433x3 or equivalent

Protection leather shoes made according to standard EN ISO 20344 (or equivalent) and EN ISO 20347 (or equivalent), without protection finger cap that is against impact and nagging. The shoes should be water-proof with sole, slip resistant to all types of hard floors in open or closed space. Shoes size 35-45

Boots-rubber, made according to standard EN ISO 20344 (or equivalent) and EN ISO 20347 (or equivalent) without protection finger cap that is against impact and nagging. The boots should be water-proof with sole, slip resistant to all types of hard floors in open or closed space. Shoes size 35-45. Color White

Clothes (trousers with suspenders) for protection against bad weather (working on open space, during rain and cold weather). Made according to standard EN342 or equivalent and standard EN343 or equivalent. Water resistant. Color by choice of the contracting organ

Clothes (trousers with suspenders) for protection against bad weather (working on open space, during rain and cold weather). Made according to standard EN342 or equivalent and standard EN343 or equivalent. Water resistant. Color by choice of the contracting organ

Clothing (jacket) for protection against bad weather (working on open space, during rain and cold weather). Made of Rips Top 250-260 gr./m2. 100 % polyester with PVC coating for water resistance according to standard EN342 or equivalent and standard EN343 Class 3:1 or equivalent. Water resistant.Jackets should have fluorescent

Working T-shirts for boiler room and house-keeper: Working T-shirt with short sleeves. Description: Polo T-shirt with collar, short sleeves and three bottoms. Color: by choice. Materials features: 100 % cotton. 180-190 gr./m2

Description: pilot suit: jacket with 4 pockets (2 upper pockets with zippers + 2 lower cut pockets), zipper, vest and sleeves rubber band. Color: by choice. Materials features: 250-270 gr./m2, 65 % polyester +35 % cotton. Trousers with suspenders with 4 pockets (1 pocket, 2 front pockets and 1 back pocket). Color: by choice. Materials features: 250-270 gr./m2, 65 % polyester +35 % cotton

Working multi-purpose vest. Description: water-resistant, thermo-isolation, with 4 pockets in the lower part and 4 pockets in the chest area, with zipper covered with lath. Rubber band around the sleeves. Side zippers for increased comfort. Color: dark blue/black. Materials features: 100 % polyester with PVC coating for water resistance 230-250 gr./m2, 100 % lining 100 % polyester + 220gr./m2 cotton wool

Working high shoes C3: To be certified according to MKC EN ISO 20345; 20347. Composite non-metal drop and Kevlar soleplate, which should be impact resistant. The upper part should be made of bovine leather with thickness of 1,8-2mm, hydrophobic, black. The sole should be made of double-injected polyurethane with high resistance of slipping and wearing out. Sole height should be 20-35 mm in the finger area and 30-50 mm in the heel area. The shoes height should be from 13-16 cm
Working gloves: resistant to motor oil, oil and oil derivatives. Thickness 1 mm, length 25-27cm. Material features: 100 % PVC on cotton basis

EXISTENCE_OTHER_PARTICULAR_CONDITIONS.P: Guarantee for quality performance of the contract: yes (5 %).

In order to qualify as capable of performing the subject public procurement contract from the aspect of quality systems standards, the economic operator shall meet the following standards: The economic operator — bidder should own Certificate for management quality system standard ISO 9001-2015. The economic operator shall prove the fulfillment of the standards by submitting of — the economic operator bidder should own and submit Certificate for management quality system standard ISO 9001-2015, which should be enclosed to the bid.

In order to qualify as capable of performing the subject public procurement contract from the aspect of environment standards, the economic operator should meet one of the following standards — The economic operator — bidder should own Certificate ISO 14001-2015 — Environment management standard. The economic operator proved the meeting of one of the standards by submitting Certificate ISO 14001-2015 — Environment management standard.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: In order to prove its personal condition the economic operator is obliged to submit the following documents:
— statement of the economic operator that in the past five years it was not rendered a final judgment for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation by a competent organ that a bankruptcy procedure was not opened,
— confirmation by a competent organ that a liquidation procedure was not opened,
— confirmation for paid taxes, contributions and other public duties by a competent organ in the country where the economic operator was registered,

— certificate from the Registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that minor penalty ban on participation in public tender procedures, awarding contracts and agreements for public-private partnership has not been imposed on him,
— certificate from the Registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that a minor penalty for temporary or permanent prohibition of a specific activity has not been imposed over him,
— confirmation that a final judgment — prohibition of professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing professional activity has not been imposed over him.
Capacity for performing professional activity of economic operator:

In order to prove its capacity for performing professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity as an evidence that it has been registered as legal or natural entity for performing the activity related to the public procurement subject or an evidence that it is a member of a relevant professional association in accordance to the regulations of the country where it is registered.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The contracting organ shall use electronic auction as a last phase in the subject procedure. Subject of the auction is the lowest offered price for each part of the public procurement subject, i.e. the lowest price of the acceptable bids submitted in the initial phase of the procedure. The invitations for participation at the auction shall be submitted in electronic form through ESJN after full evaluation of the initial bids, to all economic operators that submitted acceptable bids in the first phase of the procedure. The invitation for participation in the auction shall contain the following data: starting price of the auction, i.e. the lowest price of the initially submitted bids; date and hour of beginning and the ending of auction; the interval in which the negative bidding shall take place (minimum and maximum difference in the offered prices); as well as the current ranking of the bidder made on the basis of the previously submitted price. More information regarding the electronic auction is contained in the tender documentation.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: PHI Health House of Skopje — Polyclinic Bit Pazar — second floor, Meeting Hall, address Krste Misirkov Bld nº 28, 1000 Skopje-R.Macedonia

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Authorized persons of the economic operators should submit a Power of Attorney in order to participate and take active participation in the public opening of bids.
